function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of Covid-19 in construction industry due to lack of preventive measures","Impact":"Project delays, financial losses, and grounded projects","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, providing necessary protective equipment, and enforcing social distancing measures","Technologies":"Contactless temperature scanners, remote project management tools, and virtual communication platforms","People":"Construction workers, project managers, and clients","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Financial constraints in construction companies due to lack of spending on construction projects","Impact":"Loss of revenue, job losses, and economic downturn","Mitigation":"Diversification of services, seeking financial support, and implementing cost-cutting measures","Technologies":"Financial management software, digital lending platforms, and budgeting tools","People":"Construction companies, employees, and clients","Owner":"Construction companies and financial institutions"},{"Description":"Supply chain disruptions due to lockdown restrictions impacting construction materials","Impact":"Grounding of projects, delays in construction, and increased project costs","Mitigation":"Diversifying suppliers, maintaining larger inventory, and securing alternative transportation options","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, inventory tracking systems, and transportation management systems","People":"Construction companies, suppliers, and transportation providers","Owner":"Construction companies and suppliers"}]}
